segment.source: BitLocker uses encryption to protect the data on your drive, but BitLocker security is only effective when the encryption key is protected.
segment.target: BitLocker uses encryption to protect the data on your drive, but BitLocker security is only effective when the encryption key is protected.

segment.source: Many users have relied on pre-boot authentication to protect the operating system’s integrity, disk encryption solution (for example, encryption keys), and the PC’s data from offline attacks.
segment.target: Many users have relied on pre-boot authentication to protect the operating system’s integrity, disk encryption solution (for example, encryption keys), and the PC’s data from offline attacks.

segment.source: With pre-boot authentication, users must provide some form of credential before unlocking encrypted volumes and starting Windows.
segment.target: With pre-boot authentication, users must provide some form of credential before unlocking encrypted volumes and starting Windows.

segment.source: Typically, they authenticate themselves using a PIN or a USB flash drive as a key.
segment.target: Typically, they authenticate themselves using a PIN or a USB flash drive as a key.

segment.source: Full-volume encryption using BitLocker Drive Encryption is vital for protecting data and system integrity on devices running the Windows 10, Windows 8.1, Windows 8, or Windows 7 operating system.
segment.target: Full-volume encryption using BitLocker Drive Encryption is vital for protecting data and system integrity on devices running the Windows 10, Windows 8.1, Windows 8, or Windows 7 operating system.

segment.source: It is equally important to protect the BitLocker encryption key.
segment.target: It is equally important to protect the BitLocker encryption key.

segment.source: On Windows 7 devices, sufficiently protecting that key often required pre-boot authentication, which many users find inconvenient and complicates device management.
segment.target: On Windows 7 devices, sufficiently protecting that key often required pre-boot authentication, which many users find inconvenient and complicates device management.

segment.source: Pre-boot authentication provides excellent startup security, but it inconveniences users and increases IT management costs.
segment.target: Pre-boot authentication provides excellent startup security, but it inconveniences users and increases IT management costs.

segment.source: Every time the PC is unattended, the device must be set to hibernate (in other words, shut down and powered off); when the computer restarts, users must authenticate before the encrypted volumes are unlocked.
segment.target: Every time the PC is unattended, the device must be set to hibernate (in other words, shut down and powered off); when the computer restarts, users must authenticate before the encrypted volumes are unlocked.

segment.source: This requirement increases restart times and prevents users from accessing remote PCs until they can physically access the computer to authenticate, making pre-boot authentication unacceptable in the modern IT world, where users expect their devices to turn on instantly and IT requires PCs to be constantly connected to the network.
segment.target: This requirement increases restart times and prevents users from accessing remote PCs until they can physically access the computer to authenticate, making pre-boot authentication unacceptable in the modern IT world, where users expect their devices to turn on instantly and IT requires PCs to be constantly connected to the network.

segment.source: If users lose their USB key or forget their PIN, they can’t access their PC without a recovery key.
segment.target: If users lose their USB key or forget their PIN, they can’t access their PC without a recovery key.

segment.source: With a properly configured infrastructure, the organization’s support will be able to provide the recovery key, but doing so increases support costs, and users might lose hours of productive work time.
segment.target: With a properly configured infrastructure, the organization’s support will be able to provide the recovery key, but doing so increases support costs, and users might lose hours of productive work time.

segment.source: Starting with Windows 8, Secure Boot and Windows Trusted Boot startup process ensures operating system integrity, allowing Windows to start automatically while minimizing the risk of malicious startup tools and rootkits.
segment.target: Starting with Windows 8, Secure Boot and Windows Trusted Boot startup process ensures operating system integrity, allowing Windows to start automatically while minimizing the risk of malicious startup tools and rootkits.

segment.source: In addition, many modern devices are fundamentally physically resistant to sophisticated attacks against the computer’s memory, and now Windows authenticates the user before making devices that may represent a threat to the device and encryption keys available for use.
segment.target: In addition, many modern devices are fundamentally physically resistant to sophisticated attacks against the computer’s memory, and now Windows authenticates the user before making devices that may represent a threat to the device and encryption keys available for use.
